item.start_core.bacteria_dormant.tooltip: §7Reawaken this colony and discover its secrets
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.harvester_: §7Actual main fluid output amount is §62000mB * Production
§dOne of the three byproducts will be outputted based on input affinity
§7Actual byproduct fluid output amount is §6320mB * Production
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.input: §7A Bacteria with any stats & affinity can be inputted
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.vat_same_o: §7Replicated bacteria with same stats & affinity as input
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.vat_mutate: §6Mutated §7bacteria with mutated stats but the same affinity as input
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.mutator_af: §6Mutated §7bacteria with random stats and affinity from input, but same type
behaviour.start_core.bacteria.mutator_to: §6Mutated §7bacteria with random stats, affinity and type.
block.start_core.runic_mutator_descripti: §7Using runic-age technologies, bacterial colonies are mutated through extreme genetic alterations to their biological structures, either reawakening dormant colonies or reshaping existing ones into novel types.
block.start_core.rm1: §7Reawaken dormant colonies into a randomised bacterial colony with random stats, affinity and type.
block.start_core.rm4: §7Mutate bacterial colonies, changing their stats and affinity randomly along with their type depending on the type of runic plating used.
block.start_core.harvester_description: §7A precision bio-extraction device designed to process awakened bacterial colonies. It harnesses the primary outputs and byproducts generated by the bacteria, feeding and accelerating their metabolic processes to maximize yield. The extraction process culminates in the bacteria's termination.
block.start_core.hv1: §7Extract primary outputs and byproducts from bacterial colonies.
block.start_core.hv2: §7The amount of primary output extracted is equal to §f2000mB * Production §7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.hv3: §7The byproduct outputted is determined by the §fAffinity §7of the bacteria, The amount extracted is equal to §f320mB * Production §7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.hv4: §7The consumption of the bacteria scales with the §fMetabolism §7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.vat_description: §7A specialized bioreactor designed for rapid bacterial replication and evolution. It processes a single bacterial sample, outputting duplicates while simultaneously producing mutated variants, fostering both consistency and diversity for experimental or industrial applications.
block.start_core.vat2: §7Replicate and mutate bacterial colonies, producing a large amount for usage in Harvesting or Mutation.
block.start_core.vat3: §7Produces §f16x Replicated§7 bacteria with the exact same type, stats and affinity.
block.start_core.vat4: §7Produces §f16x Mutated§7 bacteria with the exact same type and affinity, but mutated stats depending on the §fMutatability §7of the bacteria.
block.start_core.uhv_auxiliary_boosted_f: Auxiliary Boosted Fusion Reactor MK I
start_core.machine.auxiliary_boosted_fus: §7A high-efficiency fusion reactor that utilises auxiliary fusion coils to enhance fusion reactions, enabling for higher density of fusion reactions taking place within the chamber at once
§7The reactor only takes {0} energy hatches, Each hatch increases the buffer of the reactor by {1}M EU
block.start_core.auxiliary_boosted_fusio: Auxiliary Boosted Fusion Casing MK I
start_core.machine.auxiliary_boosted_fus: §7Any Perfect Parallel Mastery Hatches can be used enabling high rates of production.
start_core.machine.parallel_hatch_mk5.to: Allows to run up to 1024 recipes in parallel.
start_core.machine.parallel_hatch_mk6.to: Allows to run up to 4096 recipes in parallel.
start_core.machine.parallel_hatch_mk7.to: Allows to run up to 16384 recipes in parallel.
start_core.machine.perfect_parallel_hatc: Allows to run up to 4 recipes in parallel.
Allows to run up to 16 recipes in parallel.
Allows to run up to 64 recipes in parallel.
